changeSet.author: fshaikh
changeSet.sql:
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] ADD [GlAccoutnIDGLAccountID] [int] NULL
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] WITH NOCHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_StatisticalData_GLAccounts_GlAccoutnIDGLAccountID] FOREIGN KEY ([GlAccoutnIDGLAccountID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[GLAccounts] ([GLAccountID])
CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_StatisticalData_GlAccoutnIDGLAccountID] ON [dbo].[StatisticalData] ([GlAccoutnIDGLAccountID] ASC)
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] ADD [GLAccountMasterIDGLAccountID] [int] NULL
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] WITH NOCHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_StatisticalData_GLAccounts_GLAccountMasterIDGLAccountID] FOREIGN KEY ([GLAccountMasterIDGLAccountID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[GLAccounts] ([GLAccountID])
CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_StatisticalData_GLAccountMasterIDGLAccountID] ON [dbo].[StatisticalData] ([GLAccountMasterIDGLAccountID] ASC)
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] ADD [GLAccountTypeIDItemTypeID] [int] NULL
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[StatisticalData] WITH NOCHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [FK_StatisticalData_ItemTypes_GLAccountTypeIDItemTypeID] FOREIGN KEY ([GLAccountTypeIDItemTypeID]) REFERENCES [dbo].[ItemTypes] ([ItemTypeID])
CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_StatisticalData_GLAccountTypeIDItemTypeID] ON [dbo].[StatisticalData] ([GLAccountTypeIDItemTypeID] ASC)
